0.npc_text: Halt! What business do you have at Mosswatch Keep?

1.npc_text: Try Sergeant Rodrick in the Tidehunter Quarter.

matthias_report.npc_text: I don't have time for drunk talk. Make it quick.

matthias_evidence.npc_text: Let me see that. ... This alloy... this is contraband. Shadow steel. Finn has been smuggling this under our noses?

player_choices.text: There's more where that came from.

matthias_plan.npc_text: This is enough for a warrant. Go to Sergeant Rodrick in the Tidehunter Quarter. He will organize the raid.

matthias_raid_ready.npc_text: My men are on standby. Go to the Salty Mug. The option to Raid will be available.
